Package game.weathers

Class WeatherManager

java.lang.Object
game.weathers.WeatherManager
public class WeatherManager
extends java.lang.Object
The WeatherManager class is responsible for managing the game's weather conditions and their effects on objects that implement the WeatherControllable interface. It allows for switching between different weather conditions and updating the behavior or state of objects in response to weather changes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void controlEnemy​(Display display)
    Updates the behavior or state of objects implementing the WeatherControllable interface based on the current weather condition.
    static WeatherManager getInstance()
    Constructor for the WeatherManager class.
    void registerWeatherControllable​(WeatherControllable weatherControllable)
    Registers a weather-controllable entity to be managed by the WeatherManager.
    void removeWeatherControllable​(WeatherControllable weatherControllable)
    Removes a weather-controllable entity from the list of managed entities.
    void switchWeather​(Display display)
    Switches the current weather condition between sunny and rainy.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static WeatherManager getInstance()
      Constructor for the WeatherManager class. Initializes the current weather to be rainy and creates an empty list of weather-controllable entities.

    • switchWeather

      public void switchWeather​(Display display)
      Switches the current weather condition between sunny and rainy. Outputs a message indicating the weather change to the provided display.
      Parameters:
      display - The display used to output information about the weather change.

    • controlEnemy

      public void controlEnemy​(Display display)
      Updates the behavior or state of objects implementing the WeatherControllable interface based on the current weather condition. Outputs information about the weather-related changes to the provided display.
      Parameters:
      display - The display used to output information about the weather-related changes.

    • registerWeatherControllable

      public void registerWeatherControllable​(WeatherControllable weatherControllable)
      Registers a weather-controllable entity to be managed by the WeatherManager.
      Parameters:
      weatherControllable - The entity implementing the WeatherControllable interface.

    • removeWeatherControllable

      public void removeWeatherControllable​(WeatherControllable weatherControllable)
      Removes a weather-controllable entity from the list of managed entities.
      Parameters:
      weatherControllable - The entity to be removed.
